tool_description:
# Scene Classification

This scene classification model identifies the scenes in images and videos at scale. The model checks the scene location (indoor/outdoor) and groups them under different categories based on their attributes. It returns multiple scene labels and detailed attributes. 
Scene classification API is used to detect indoor and outdoor scenes in an image.
name: Scene Classification
title: Scene Classification

api_list.name: Scene classification from image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scene-classification.p.rapidapi.com/scenery-classify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scene-classification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://scene-classification.p.rapidapi.com/scenery-classify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scene-classification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
